item.title: 美国 5 月商品贸易逆差扩大，出口下降
item.description: 由于出口下降，美国 5 月份的货物贸易逆差有所增加，但进口流入的减少可能会使贸易在第二季度对国内生产总值做出重大贡献。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit in goods increased in May amid a decline in exports, but an ebbing inflow of imports likely positions trade to make a big contribution to gross domestic product in the second quarter.】

item.title: 美国第一季度国内生产总值因消费者支出不振而下调
item.description: 在消费者支出不振的情况下，第一季度美国经济的萎缩速度略快于此前的预期，这凸显了特朗普政府对进口商品征收激进关税所造成的扭曲。【原文：The U.S. economy contracted a bit faster than previously thought in the first quarter amid tepid consumer spending, underscoring the distortions caused by the Trump administration's aggressive tariffs on imported goods.】

item.title: 美国 5 月耐用品订单因飞机而激增
item.description: 尽管进口关税带来的经济不确定性仍制约着企业的资本支出，但受商用飞机预订量激增的推动，5 月份美国长期制成品订单大幅反弹。【原文：Orders for long-lasting U.S. manufactured goods rebounded sharply in May, boosted by a surge in commercial aircraft bookings, though economic uncertainty stemming from import tariffs remains a constraint for business spending on capital.】

item.title: 培生与谷歌联手将人工智能学习工具引入课堂
item.description: 英国教育公司培生（Pearson）周四表示，该公司已与 Alphabet 的谷歌云服务建立了多年合作关系，为学生提供人工智能学习工具，同时也让教师的工作变得更轻松。【原文：Pearson has entered a multi-year partnership with Alphabet's Google cloud service, providing students with AI learning tools that also make teachers' jobs easier, the British education company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 首次推出点对点支付应用 Krak
item.description: 加密货币交易所克拉肯（Kraken）周四推出了一款点对点支付应用程序，使用户能够在一百多个国家发送和接收加密货币和法币资金。【原文：Crypto exchange Kraken on Thursday launched a peer-to-peer payments app that enables users to send and receive funds - in both cryptocurrency and fiat currency - across more than a hundred countries.】

item.title: Lyft 征求司机的战略意见，帮助引导机器人出租车的推广
item.description: 本周四，Lyft 首次推出了 "司机自主论坛"，这项新举措旨在让经验丰富的司机参与制定关键战略，因为该公司已开始将机器人出租车整合到其打车服务中。【原文：Lyft introduced its first-ever Driver Autonomous Forum on Thursday, a new initiative designed to engage seasoned drivers in shaping key strategies as the company begins integrating robotaxis into its ride-hailing service.】

item.title: 快时尚竞争对手因关税而涨价，H&M 试图吸引美国购物者
item.description: 由于美国关税扰乱了依赖从中国、越南和其他亚洲国家进口低成本服装的快速时尚产业，H&M 正试图通过保持价格稳定，同时提高 Zara 和 Shein 的价格，从美国竞争对手那里赢得购物者。【原文：H&M is trying to win shoppers from rivals in the United States by holding prices steady while Zara and Shein raise theirs, as U.S. tariffs disrupt the fast-fashion industry that relies on imports of low-cost clothes from China, Vietnam, and other Asian countries.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称关税将开始推高通胀率
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长托马斯-巴尔金（Thomas Barkin）周四表示，关税极有可能在未来几个月内推高通胀，他在讲话中表示，央行政策正处于应对未来形势所需的位置。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Thomas Barkin said Thursday tariffs are very likely to push inflation up over coming months, in remarks that said central bank policy is where it needs to be to deal with what lies ahead.】

item.title: 必和必拓因巴西溃坝融资案面临英国藐视法庭指控
item.description: 伦敦高等法院周四裁定，必和必拓将在英国面临一次全面的藐视法庭听证会，因为必和必拓资助诉讼，试图阻止巴西一些市政府就巴西最严重的环境灾难之一起诉这家矿业巨头。【原文：BHP faces a full contempt of court hearing in Britain for funding litigation to try to prevent some Brazilian municipalities suing the mining giant over one of Brazil's worst environmental disasters, London's High Court ruled on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降，但失业人数仍在增加
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数有所下降，但由于更多的下岗人员努力寻找工作，6月份的失业率可能会上升。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits fell last week, but the unemployment rate could rise in June as more laid off people struggle to find work.】

item.title: 私募股权投资公司老板称维珍澳大利亚公司可渡过中东波动期
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）合伙人迈克-墨菲（Mike Murphy）相信，维珍澳大利亚航空公司对国内业务的重视将有助于该公司抵御中东紧张局势造成的旅行中断和油价波动。【原文：Bain Capital partner Mike Murphy is confident Virgin Australia's domestic business focus will help the airline withstand travel disruptions and oil price volatility created by the ongoing Middle East tensions.】

item.title: 市场担忧美联储独立性，对美元不抱希望
item.description: 由于投资者对美国中央银行独立性削弱的新迹象感到不安，他们不遗余力地将美元推回到三年多来的最低水平，美元再次遭受重创。【原文：A battered dollar is taking another beating as investors, unnerved by fresh signs of an erosion in U.S. central bank independence, waste no time in pushing the greenback back to its lowest levels in over three years.】

item.title: Meta 签订协议，为数据中心提供更多太阳能和风能资源
item.description: 可再生能源开发商 Invenergy 和社交媒体巨头 Meta Platforms 周四表示，两家公司已经签署了四项协议，将为数据中心的运营提供 791 兆瓦（MW）的太阳能和风能。【原文：Renewable energy developer Invenergy and social media giant Meta Platforms have signed four deals to supply 791 megawatts (MW) more of solar and wind power to operate data centers, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 加密货币在玻利维亚站稳脚跟，小企业寻求货币替代品
item.description: 在玻利维亚科恰班巴市的繁华商业区，自动取款机可以让购物者将硬币换成加密货币，美容院提供用比特币支付的减价优惠，人们用Binance账户购买炸鸡。【原文：In the busy shopping district of the Bolivian city of Cochabamba, ATMs let shoppers swap coins for cryptocurrency, beauty salons offer cut-price deals if you pay in Bitcoin, and people use Binance accounts to buy fried chicken.】

item.title: 英国广播公司面向美国用户推出付费订阅服务
item.description: 英国广播公司（BBC）周四表示，将在美国推出付费订阅服务，因为在与英国政府就其资金问题进行谈判之际，这家由政府资助的广播公司正在探索新的收入来源。【原文：The BBC is rolling out paid subscriptions in the United States, it said on Thursday, as the publicly-funded broadcaster explores new revenue streams amid negotiations with the British government over its funding.】

item.title: 欧洲央行经济学家利用 ChatGPT 改进国内生产总值预测
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四发表的一篇论文显示，对 PMI 发布中的定性评论进行 ChatGPT 分析，可以显著改善 GDP 预测。【原文：A ChatGPT analysis of qualitative commentary in PMI releases can significantly improve GDP forecasting, a paper published by the European Central Bank of Thursday showed.】

item.title: 押注人工智能相关内存芯片需求强劲，美光股价上涨
item.description: 美光科技（Micron Technology）股价在周四的盘前交易中上涨了 2%，此前这家芯片制造商对第四季度营收做出了强劲预测，原因是为人工智能数据中心提供动力的内存芯片需求旺盛。【原文：Micron Technology shares rose 2% in premarket trading on Thursday, after a robust forecast from the chipmaker for fourth-quarter revenue on booming demand for its memory chips that power AI data centers.】

item.title: 随着 Sycamore 交易接近完成，沃尔格林季度利润超出预期
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance）将被 Sycamore Partners 私有化，该公司周四公布的第三季度利润超过了分析师的预期，关闭门店和削减成本有助于这家美国第二大连锁药店实现扭亏为盈。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance , which is being taken private by Sycamore Partners, beat analysts' estimates for third-quarter profit on Thursday, as store closures and cost-cutting aided turnaround efforts at the second-largest U.S. pharmacy chain.】

item.title: 澳大利亚起诉与中国有关联的稀土投资者
item.description: 澳大利亚国库部长周四表示，澳大利亚正在起诉一家与中国有关联的公司和一名前合伙人，指控他们违反外国投资法，与稀土矿商北方矿业公司（Northern Minerals）有关联。【原文：Australia is suing a Chinese-linked company and a former associate over a breach of foreign investment laws linked with rare earths miner Northern Minerals , the national treasurer said on Thursday, adding it was the first case of its kind.】

item.title: Palantir 合作为核电建设开发人工智能软件
item.description: Palantir Technologies 公司周四表示，该公司正与一家核电部署公司合作开发一种人工智能驱动的软件系统，用于建造核反应堆。【原文：Palantir Technologies on Thursday said it was teaming up with a nuclear deployment company to develop an artificial intelligence-driven software system built for the construction of nuclear reactors.】

item.title: 尽管冲突阴云密布，奢侈品行业仍对中东寄予希望
item.description: 随着中东空域的重新开放，以及美国斡旋下以色列与伊朗之间的停火协议似乎得以维持，奢侈品行业仍在依靠该地区富裕的购物者来帮助抵消其主要美国和中国市场的疲软--目前是这样。【原文：With Middle East airspace reopening and the U.S.-brokered ceasefire between Israel and Iran appearing to hold, the luxury sector is still counting on the region's wealthy shoppers to help offset weakness in its main U.S. and Chinese markets - for now.】

item.title: 前巴克莱银行首席执行官斯塔利因与爱泼斯坦的关系被禁止在英国工作而上诉失败
item.description: 巴克莱银行前老板杰斯-斯塔利（Jes Staley）因在与杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）的关系问题上误导英国金融行为监管局（FCA）而遭到金融业禁入，周四，他在针对禁入提议的高风险上诉中败诉。【原文：Former Barclays boss Jes Staley on Thursday lost his high-stakes appeal against a proposed financial industry ban for misleading Britain's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) over his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.】

item.title: 早间竞价：特朗普抨击鲍威尔，美元暴跌
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 美股期货上涨，芯片因美光业绩而上涨；GDP 数据在即
item.description: 美国股指期货周四上涨，表明股指接近历史最高点，原因是内存芯片制造商美光公司（Micron）的强劲盈利助长了投资者对人工智能的乐观情绪，同时投资者也在等待经济数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Thursday, signaling indexes were nearing their record peaks, as robust earnings from memory-chip maker Micron fueled optimism around artificial intelligence while investors awaited economic data.】

item.title: 加拿大碳技术初创公司在特朗普上台后引起美国兴趣
item.description: 加拿大一家初创公司建立了世界上第一个测试多种直接空气吸碳技术的中心，该公司表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统当选后，美国公司的询问纷至沓来。【原文：A Canadian startup that has built the world's first hub for the testing of multiple direct-air carbon-sucking technologies says it has seen an influx of inquiries from U.S. companies in the wake of President Donald Trump's election.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空的第二大投资者将考虑在不改变股权的情况下出售股份
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司的第二大投资者弗拉基米尔-加尔金（Vladimir Galkin）威胁说，如果公司的成本削减计划和其他更广泛的努力无法扭转业绩，他将出售自己在这家陷入困境的航空公司所持有的近 10%的股份。【原文：JetBlue Airways' second-largest investor, Vladimir Galkin, is threatening to sell his near 10% stake in the struggling air carrier if the company's cost-cutting plan and other broader efforts fail to turn around its performance.】

item.title: 7 月 9 日截止日期前印度和美国贸易谈判的关键问题
item.description: 印度政府消息人士称，印度与美国之间的贸易谈判因在汽车零部件、钢铁和农产品关税问题上的分歧而受阻，这使得在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）7月9日征收对等关税的最后期限之前达成临时协议的希望破灭。【原文：Trade talks between India and U.S. have hit a roadblock over disagreements on duties for auto component, steel and farm goods, Indian government sources said, dashing hopes of reaching an interim deal ahead of President Donald Trump's July 9 deadline to impose reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国人工智能芯片公司比仁科技募集新资金，计划在香港上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国人工智能芯片初创企业比仁科技（Biren Technology）已筹集到约15亿元人民币（约合2.07亿美元）新资金，并正在为香港首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Chinese AI chip startup Biren Technology has raised about 1.5 billion yuan ($207 million) in fresh funding and is preparing for a Hong Kong initial public offering, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Pine Labs 申请在印度上市
item.description: 周四的文件草案显示，印度金融科技公司Pine Labs已提交首次公开募股申请，该公司将发行价值260亿卢比（约合3.04亿美元）的新股。【原文：Indian fintech firm Pine Labs has filed for an initial public offering, draft papers showed on Thursday, with the company set to issue fresh shares worth 26 billion rupees ($304 million).】

item.title: 面对全球逆风，中国汽车制造商进军非洲
item.description: 由于对美国和欧洲的出口限制，中国汽车制造商开始在全球范围内寻找新的市场，他们正努力发掘非洲欠发达地区的潜力，并将重点放在电动汽车和混合动力汽车上。【原文：Chinese automakers are pushing to unlock Africa's underdeveloped potential, with a focus on electric and hybrid vehicles, as restrictions on exports to the United States and Europe send them on a global quest for new markets.】
